languages.text: Increases {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against daemon enemies by +2. If the wearer has the {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}, the damage is increased by +4 instead.
languages.original_text: Эта накидка увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} против врагов-демонов на +2. Если у носителя {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Убеждение{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g}, урон увеличивается на +4.

traits.locale_text: Increases {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} damage against daemon enemies by +2. If the wearer has the Imperialis conviction, the damage is increased by +4 instead.

languages.text: Augmente de +2 les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} contre les démons. languages.text: 所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}对恶魔造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高2点。如果装备者拥有{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}信念{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}教条主义{/g}，则伤害提高4点。

languages.text: Aumenta +2 el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra los enemigos daemónicos. Si el portador tiene la {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}convicción{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}, el daño aumenta a +4.

languages.text: ディーモンに対する{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+2増加する。着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}教条主義{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}信念{/g}を持っている場合、そのダメージは+4に増える。

traits.locale_text: ディーモンの敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}ダメージが2増える。使用者が帝国の信念を持っている場合、そのダメージは4に増える。

languages.text: İblis düşmanlara karşı {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarını{/g} +2 artırır. Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Kanaat{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} sahibiyse hasar onun yerine +4 artar.
